title: ePublishing with InDesign CS6

Creative professionals are designing more and more e-books and e-zines as digital publishing increasingly gains market share. This book pulls together a wide range of essential information to help them maximize the versatility of InDesign for e-publishing. If you need to know how to build, deploy, and manage digital publications using InDesign, hereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s your guide to the process, from understanding the platforms and devices and how best to design for them to creating media-rich content for multiple formats using a variety of technologies.

    Designers are seeking to sharpen their skills to compete in todayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s e-publishing market, and this book is packed with necessary information about creating and adapting content for e-publication

    Covers platforms, devices, and formats; creating media-rich content; designing for different devices; and managing digital publications
    Examines AdobeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Digital Publishing System, CSS, HTML5, and other commercial vehicles available for e-publishing on multiple platforms, including iPad, Kindle, NOOK, and other tablets and e-readers
